short_summary: Labor services for METC Valcartier and METC Nicolet.
description: National Defence seeks labour services to support operations at METC Valcartier and METC Nicolet. The work includes activities outlined in Section 4 of annex A - Statement of Work. The Department has a security requirement associated with this requirement. For more information see the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (https://ssi-iss.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html).
duration_in_months: There is no valid value for duration_in_months.
